thread.title: Manchester City transfer news: Samir Handanovic wanted by Pep Guardiola as Inter Milan hires new Etihad-friendly agent
thread.title_full: Manchester City transfer news: Samir Handanovic wanted by Pep Guardiola as Inter Milan hires new Etihad-friendly agent

author: achapman
title: Manchester City transfer news: Samir Handanovic wanted by Pep Guardiola as Inter Milan hires new Etihad-friendly agent
text:
Need a Hand? Manchester City transfer news: Samir Handanovic wanted by Pep Guardiola as Inter Milan hires new Etihad-friendly agent 
Slovenian goalkeeper could be heading to England this summer as a replacement for error-prone Claudio Bravo Gossip Comments MANCHESTER CITY are reportedly plotting a summer bid for Inter Milan goalie Samir Handanovic. 
City boss Pep Guardiola famously axed Joe Hart last year to bring in Claudio Bravo from Barcelona . Getty Images 5 Manchester City are reportedly lining up a bid for Inter Milan goalie Samir Handanovic 
But the Chilean quickly made a number of big errors and has now been dropped in favour of reserve keeper Willy Caballero. Keep up to date with ALL the Manchester City news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
It means City are likely to enter the market for another shot-stopper once the window opens in July. 
And top of their list is Inter star Handanovic, who has been with the Milan giants since 2012. Getty Images The Slovenian has just landed a new agent who’s friendly with Etihad chiefs Pep Guardiola gets touchy with the media about Manchester City playing style Reuters Claudio Bravo has proven to be a flop since his move from Barcelona last summer 
Calciomercato claims the Slovenia international has recently made Fali Ramadani his new agent. 
And the negotiator is purported to be a good friend of those behind the scenes at the Etihad, having helped the club secure deals for Stevan Jovetic and Matija Nastasic in the past. Related Stories DOUBLE DEAL Benfica chief travels to Manchester for talks with Utd and City over £67.7m deals for Semedo and Ederson ABU HAVING FUN? Manchester City's stars arrive at their luxurious 5-star Emirates Palace Abu Dhabi hotel - where the cheapest room is £500 A NIGHT Guard down Liverpool handed major boost in pursuit of Joe Hart as Manchester City say he is available for £20m SORRY FOR SCORING Leroy Sane APOLOGISES after his goal in Man City's 5-3 win Monaco costs one punter £30,000 Getty Images Joe Hart was sent packing to Torino and is unlikely to feature again under Pep Guardiola PA:Press Association 5 Backup Willy Caballero is now the go-to goalie at City 
Handanovic himself is apparently keen to join City having never played in the Champions League during his time at the San Siro. 
Inter are open to selling as Handanovic approaches his 33 rd birthday, with Genoa’s Mattia Perin, Bayer Leverkusen’s Bernd Leno and Atletico Madrid’s Jan Oblak in their sights.
